title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 366.8 - Food stamp eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 366.8 - Food stamp eligibility

State Regulations

Persons eligible for CAP will have their eligibility for
food stamps determined by the social services district in which the persons
reside. The district must obtain the documentation necessary to determine food
stamp eligibility in accordance with Part 387 of this Title and any subsequent

Federal waivers obtained which modify any of the provisions of that

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
366.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
